topics.body:
Hey Thanotos; at the risk of potentially starting a fight, but I do have a legitimate question:
What the fuck is up with college frats trying to get laid by taking women's studies or joining feminist organizations?

The college I'm going to sure I'm taking online classes, but they promote current students to discuss with new students or people interested in the college and I was talking about potential classes. The college offers women's studies and such; I almost glanced over, to be honest I was browsing filler classes and didn't care, but what caught my attention was a couple of anonymous comments going "Join women's studies!  They're super easy to fuck.  All you have to do is claim to be a feminist and they'll suck yo dick!"

Is this really a thing?  College frats joining those sorts of classes to get laid?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body: of course it's a thing; never disregard the power of a pussy
topics.author: 50a843d47f123b2e7c001359
